title: The Purple Rose of Cairo
description: Manhattan playwright Henry meets archaeologist Tom Baxter while on vacation in Egypt. He invites Tom back to New York where he falls for Kitty Haynes, singer at the Copacabana.
quote: A fortune-teller predicted I’d fall in love in New York.
altHero: Tom Baxter in archaeologist clothing holding a lantern
alt1: Henry dressed in a tuxedo smoking a cigarette at a grand piano
alt2: Baxter, still holding the lantern, talking to Henry and his friends
alt4: Kitty Haynes singing in front of an orchestra
